mainHero.title: Meridio
mainHero.description: We want people to spend less time meal prepping and more time doing things they love. Meridio is a meal preparation platform that connects people with cooks in their city. Meridio enables cooks to prepare authentic and varied meals from the comfort of their own home, share their culture with others and become financially independent.

items.title: Cook User Journey
items.description: Copy briefly outlining the user flow we envision for cooks on the platform. I think we can emphasise how about how simple and quick it can be and how anyone can do it!

items.title: Customer User Journey
items.description: Copy briefly outlining the user flow we envision for customers on the platform. I think we can emphasise how about how simple and quick it can be and how anyone can do it!

features.title: Latest & greatest

items.name: React.js
items.description: React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces or UI components.

items.name: Tailwind
items.description: Tailwind CSS is a highly customizable, low-level CSS framework for quickly creating beautiful designs without any annoying opinionated stylesheet nonsense.

items.name: Next.js
items.description: Next.js is a framework for server-rendered React applications using Next.js.

items.name: Typescript
items.description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft.
